newsitem.title: USA: Champion International Q4 earnings summary.
newsitem.headline: Champion International Q4 earnings summary.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers) Full company name is Champion International Corp

NOTE: The company said net income for the three and 12 months ended December 1996 included income of $14 million from an asset sale and an insurance refund and charges of $9 million for writedown of certain paper and wood products assets. Net income for the 12 months ended December 1995 included gains of $89 million from sales of certain operations in Canada and charge of $68 million for asset writedown.
The company later said there were 95.6 million shares outstanding.
